traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the chupacabra has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Drain Blood
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature that is {@condition prone}, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken, and the chupacabra regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
